mapper.select: select * from t_user a,t_role_user b where a.id=b.user_id and b.role_id=#{role_id}
select count(b.user_id) from t_role_user b where b.role_id=#{role_id}
select * from t_user a where a.loginName=#{loginName}
select c.url from t_role_user a,t_role_menu b,t_menu c where a.role_id=b.role_id and b.menu_id=c.id and c.url is not null and a.user_id=#{user_id}
select a.* from t_user a,t_position_org_user b,t_position c where a.id=b.user_id and b.position_id=c.id and c.positiontype_id=#{positionType_id}
